item.description:
> About Shippiddge

Pierce Shipp (aka Shippiddge) is a Filmmaker/Animator/Voice Actor/Real Living Person from Southern California, USA.

In the mid-2000's, he was best known for creating sprite-based webcomics inspired by video games and producing amateur camcorder movies with his friends.

His YouTube Channel was launched in 2006, his work primarily consisting of machinima (movies created within video game engines). He signed with Machinima.com in 2008, producing videos for their "Director" program. His machinima series "Smashtasm", created using Super Smash Bros, gained him a cult following online. In 2009, his short film, "Flying", won the "Machinima Audience Award" at the Ivy Film Festival.

In 2013, he created the first episode of what became the viral animated series "Starter Squad". In 2015, he graduated from Brown University with a Bachelor of Arts in Modern Culture and Media. In 2019, he completed the Character Animation program at Animation Mentor - The Online Animation School. By 2022, his YouTube channel had ammassed over one million subscribers.

Shippiddge currently resides in Las Vegas, where he is attempting to complete the final episode of "Starter Squad". Shipp's interests include Nintendo, art, dogs, jump rope, improvisational comedy, and YOU!

CFC vs CMD Forums (2009)

Interactive comics where forum users decide what happens next. The accompanying text and forum posts have now been lost to time, so what's being communicated is now left to the imaginiation. I've also censored some of the more obscene bits.
Misc. Digital Comics (2006-2008)
Misc. Sprite Comics (2005-2007)

Sonic Logic (2005 - 2006)

Follow off-kilter versions of Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles as they traverse videogame universes in their attempt to return home.

MACHINIMA

Machinima is an animation technique using real-time screen capturing in computer graphics engines, video games and virtual worlds to create a cinematic production. The word "machinima" is a portmanteau of the words machine and cinema.

Featured Video
1 / 1
MACHINIMA SHORTS

SMASHTASM (2007-2012)

One player's journey through the online universe of "Smashtasm". A Super Smash Bros machinima series.

BEANS (2008)

A three-way collaboration between three Smash machinima series: GuitarmasterX7's "Brawlgasm", Dexterboy124's "Peach's Slutty Adventure", and Shippiddge's "Smashtasm".

Want to dub Starter Squad into another language? This should help!


This pack features each Episode without a dialogue track and its accompanying script.  
(Note that the final dialogue mix sometimes differs from the original script.)
You are free to dub and upload these with your own audio added.
Just be sure to credit me (Shippiddge) and link to my YouTube channel (Youtube.com/Shippiddge).

STARTER SQUAD

Starter Squad is an animated parody series starring the original starter Pokemon on their quest for evolution.
The series has been produced at a slow drip production cycle since 2013, with each episode attempting to out-do the last. Once completed, the series will consist of twelve episodes. Interested in creating a language dub? Check out the Official Dubbing Pack.
